author: David J. Lynch
title: This Los Angeles port is among the first casualties of Trump’s trade war - The Washington Post
description: The number of shipping containers that sailed into the nation’s top container port last week was roughly one-third lower than during the same period last year.

title: Listeria outbreak hospitalizes at least 10 in California and Nevada - NBC News

title: Markets to Decide If Words Are Enough After US-China Trade Talks - Bloomberg
